line: Meanings of defined terms
label: heading

line: These definitions apply to this section and are in addition to the policy definitions that have already
label: paragraph

line: been described in the Essential Information document. If a word or phrase has a defined meaning it
label: paragraph

line: will be underlined and will have the same meaning wherever it is used in this section
label: paragraph

line: Damage
label: heading

line: Loss or destruction or damage.
label: paragraph

line: Hacking
label: heading

line: Unauthorised access to any computer or other equipment, component, system or item
label: paragraph

line: which processes, stores, transmits or retrieves data whether your property or not
label: paragraph

line: Phishing
label: heading

line: Any access or attempted access to data or information made by means of
label: paragraph

line: misrepresentation or deception.
label: paragraph

line: Own plant tools and equipment
label: heading

line: Constructional plant, machinery, trailers, tools, equipment, site huts, or caravans
label: paragraph

line: (including their contents) belonging to you
label: paragraph

line: Portable tools and equipment including electronic communication and computing
label: paragraph

line: equipment the personal property of partners, principals, directors or employees up
label: paragraph

line: to the value of £500 any one person, which are ordinarily used or needed on the site
label: paragraph

line: of any contract carried out by you in connection with the business
label: paragraph

line: a) anywhere within the policy territories
label: paragraph

line: b) elsewhere within the European Union in connection with temporary work by
label: paragraph

line: persons ordinarily resident within the policy territories for a period or periods of
label: paragraph

line: up to 180 days in total, during any one period of insurance.
label: paragraph

line: Stock in trade belonging to you, referred to in your schedule as ’stock in trade’,
label: paragraph

line: while at your premises, or in a securely locked store or compound within the policy
label: paragraph

line: territories, or in transit by road, rail or inland waterway.
label: paragraph

line: Terrorism
label: heading

line: In England, Scotland and Wales: Acts of persons acting on behalf of, or in connection
label: paragraph

line: with, any organisation which carries out activities directed towards the overthrowing or
label: paragraph

line: influencing, by force or violence, of Her Majesty’s Government in the United Kingdom or
label: paragraph

line: any other government de jure or de facto.
label: paragraph

line: In Northern Ireland: An act including, but not limited to the use of force or violence and
label: paragraph

line: or threat thereof of any person or group(s) of persons whether acting alone or on behalf
label: paragraph

line: of or in connection with any organisation(s) or government(s) committed for political,
label: paragraph

line: religious, ideological or similar purposes including the intention to influence any
label: paragraph

line: government and or put the public or any section of the public in fear.
label: paragraph

line: In the Channel Islands and the Isle of Man: An act of any person(s) acting on behalf of
label: paragraph

line: or in connection with any organisation which carries out activities directed towards the
label: paragraph

line: overthrowing or influencing by force or violence of any government de jure or de facto.
label: paragraph

line: Virus or similar mechanism
label: heading

line: Program code, programming instruction or any set of instructions intentionally
label: paragraph

line: constructed with the ability to damage, interfere with or otherwise adversely affect
label: paragraph

line: computer programs, data files or operations, whether involving self-replication or not.
label: paragraph

line: The meaning of virus or similar mechanism includes but is not limited to, trojan horses
label: paragraph

line: worms and logic bombs.
label: paragraph

line: What is not covered
label: heading

line: Aircraft or watercraft exclusion
label: heading

line: We will not cover you for damage to any
label: paragraph

line: Aircraft
label: paragraph

line: watercraft (other than watercraft not exceeding 8 metres in length or any hand-
label: paragraph

line: propelled boat or pontoon)..
label: paragraph

line: Breakdown exclusion
label: heading

line: We will not cover you for damage caused by mechanical or electrical breakdown or
label: paragraph

line: derangement.
label: paragraph

line: Date recognition exclusion
label: heading

line: We will not cover damage directly or indirectly caused by, contributed to or arising from
label: paragraph

line: the failure of equipment (including hardware and software) to correctly recognise any
label: paragraph

line: given date or to process data or to operate properly due to failure to recognise any given
label: paragraph

line: date.
label: paragraph

line: Electronic equipment exclusion
label: heading

line: We will not cover you for damage to any computer or other equipment, component,
label: paragraph

line: system or item which processes, stores, transmits or retrieves data or any part of it,
label: paragraph

line: whether tangible or intangible (including but without limitation any information,
label: paragraph

line: programs or software) and whether your property or not, where damage is caused by
label: paragraph

line: programming or operator error, virus or similar mechanism or hacking, including where
label: paragraph

line: this results from the actions of malicious persons or thieves.
label: paragraph

line: Excess exclusion
label: heading

line: We will not cover you for the amount of the excess shown in your schedule
label: paragraph

line: If a single incident results in a claim under more than one of the following sections
label: paragraph

line: of cover
label: paragraph

line: a) own plant tools and equipment,
label: paragraph

line: b) hired in plant, or
label: paragraph

line: c) contract works
label: paragraph

line: you will not be responsible for more than one excess. Where the excess varies between
label: paragraph

line: each of those sections of cover, the higher amount will apply.
label: paragraph

line: AXA Business Insurance - Own plant tools and equipment section – Tradesmen - What is not covered Go to Contents page
label: paragraph

line: Motor vehicle exclusion
label: heading

line: We will not cover you for damage to any motor vehicle or attached trailer other than
label: paragraph

line: mobile plant which is primarily intended for use at contract sites or any vehicle used
label: paragraph

line: solely at contract sites and which is not licensed for road use
label: paragraph

line: Radioactive contamination exclusion
label: heading

line: We will not cover you for loss of or damage or consequential loss resulting or arising
label: paragraph

line: from
label: paragraph

line: ionising radiation or contamination by radioactivity from any irradiated nuclear fuel
label: paragraph

line: or from any nuclear waste from the combustion of nuclear fuel
label: paragraph

line: the radioactive toxic explosive or other hazardous properties of any explosive
label: paragraph

line: nuclear assembly or its nuclear component.
label: paragraph

line: Sonic bangs exclusion
label: heading

line: We will not cover you for damage by pressure waves caused by aircraft and other aerial
label: paragraph

line: devices travelling at sonic or supersonic speeds.
label: paragraph

line: Terrorism and Northern Ireland exclusion
label: heading

line: We will not cover you for loss, damage, cost or expense of any nature directly or
label: paragraph

line: indirectly caused by, resulting from or in connection with
label: paragraph

line: In England, Scotland, Wales, the Channel Islands and the Isle of Man
label: paragraph

line: a) any act of terrorism, regardless of any other cause or event contributing
label: paragraph

line: concurrently or in any other sequence to the loss
label: paragraph

line: b) any action taken in controlling, preventing, suppressing or in any way relating to
label: paragraph

line: any act of terrorism.
label: paragraph

line: in Northern Ireland
label: paragraph

line: a) any act of terrorism, regardless of any other cause or event contributing
label: paragraph

line: concurrently or in any other sequence to the loss
label: paragraph

line: b) any action taken in controlling, preventing, suppressing or in any way relating to
label: paragraph

line: any act of terrorism
label: paragraph

line: c) riot, civil commotion and (except for damage or interruption to the business
label: paragraph

line: caused by fire or explosion) strikers, locked-out workers or people taking part in
label: paragraph

line: labour disturbances or malicious people.
label: paragraph

line: If any of the points above are found to be invalid or unenforceable, the remainder shall
label: paragraph

line: remain in full force and effect.
label: paragraph

line: In any action, law suit or other proceedings or where we state that any loss, damage,
label: paragraph

line: cost or expense is not covered by this section it will be your responsibility to prove that
label: paragraph

line: they are covered.
label: paragraph

line: Page 185 of 186
label: paragraph

line: Theft from unattended vehicle exclusion
label: heading

line: We will not cover you for theft or attempted theft of own plant tools and equipment
label: paragraph

line: while contained in an unattended vehicle or trailer, unless there is evidence of forcible
label: paragraph

line: and violent entry to the vehicle or trailer
label: paragraph

line: Unexplained losses
label: heading

line: We will not cover you for unexplained disappearance or inventory shortage.
label: paragraph

line: Unsecured storage exclusion
label: heading

line: We will not cover you for damage to own plant tools and equipment away from the site
label: paragraph

line: of any contract, unless it is being kept within a securely locked store or enclosed yard.
label: paragraph

line: War risk exclusion
label: heading

line: We will not cover
label: paragraph

line: any claims caused by or happening through war, invasion, act of foreign enemy
label: paragraph

line: hostilities (whether war is declared or not) civil war, rebellion, revolution,
label: paragraph

line: insurrection or military or usurped power
label: paragraph

line: confiscation, nationalisation, requisition or destruction of or damage to property by
label: paragraph

line: or under the order of any government or public or local authority.
label: paragraph

line: Wear and tear exclusion
label: heading

line: We will not cover you for
label: paragraph

line: damage due to wear and tear or gradual deterioration, rust, action of light or
label: paragraph

line: atmospheric conditions
label: paragraph

line: the cost of normal upkeep, cleaning or normal repairs.
label: paragraph
